sense.def:
Stvari, ki so
various
, pripadajo isti zvrsti, vendar se med seboj razlikujejo.

seg.quote: There were various questions he wanted to ask.
The birth had been delayed for various reasons.

sense.def:
Kadar za skupino stvari rečemo, da so
various
, se zelo razlikujejo med seboj.

seg.quote: His excuses are many and various.
